插入排序的基本操作就是将一个数据插入到已经排好序的有序数据中，从而得到一个新的、个数加一的有序数据，算法适用于少量数据的排序，时间复杂度为O(n^2)。是稳定的排序方法。

![](http://img.my.csdn.net/uploads/201405/15/1400117077_7279.jpg)

## python

```{python}
def insert_sort(lists):
    for i in range(1, len(lists)):
        key = lists[i]
        j = i-1 
        # insert key into lists[:i]
        while j>=0 and lists[j] > key:
            lists[j+1] = lists[j] # move
            j = j -1
        lists[j+1] = key # insert 
    return lists
```

## R
```{r}
insert_sort <- function(lists) {
  countN <- length(lists)
  for(i in 2:countN) {
    key <- lists[i]
    j <- i-1
    while(j >= 1 && lists[j] > key) {
      lists[j+1] <- lists[j]
      j <- j - 1
    }
    lists[j+1] <- key
  }
  return(lists)
}
```

# test

随机生成50个1~100之间的整数进行测试；

```{r}
library(magrittr)
runif(50, 1, 100) %>% round %T>% 
  barplot(main = "unsorted", col = "#fc8d59") %>% 
  insert_sort %>% 
  barplot(main = "sorted", col = "#99d594")
```

# GIF

利用`animation`将排序过程进行可视化。

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(animation)
lists <- runif(50, 1, 100) %>% round
saveGIF({
  countN <- length(lists)
  color <- rep("", countN)
  
  for(i in 2:countN) {
    color[1 : (i-1)] <- "#99d594" # orded
    color[i] <- "#ffffbf" # key
    color[(i+1) : countN] <- "#fc8d59" # disorded
    
    barplot(lists, col = color, yaxt = "n")
    key <- lists[i]
    j <- i-1
    while(j >= 1 && lists[j] > key) {
      lists[j+1] <- lists[j] # move
      j <- j - 1
    }
    lists[j+1] <- key
    color[i] <- "#99d594" # orded
    color[j+1] <- "#ffffbf" # insertion
    barplot(lists, col = color, yaxt = "n")
  }},
  
  movie.name = "tt.gif"
)
```
